metadata.title: CVE-2020-14405 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in LibVNCServer before 0.9.13.libvncclient/rfbproto.c does not limit TextChat size.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-14405` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvncclient1 - 0.9.10+dfsg-3ubuntu0.16.04.5
libvncserver-config - 0.9.10+dfsg-3ubuntu0.16.04.5
libvncserver1 - 0.9.10+dfsg-3ubuntu0.16.04.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvncserver package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.9.10+dfsg-3ubuntu0.16.04.5').
x11vnc package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
